item.en: Account and password can't be empty
item.de: Konto oder Passwort dürfen nicht leer sein
item.fr: Le compte ou le mot de passe ne peut pas être vide
item.it: L'account o la password non possono essere vuoti
item.ru: Аккаунт или пароль не могут быть пустыми

item.fr: Compte ou mot de passe incorrect

item.zh: 请输入正确的邮箱地址
item.en: Please enter the correct email address
item.de: Bitte geben Sie die richtige E-Mail-Adresse ein
item.ru: Пожалуйста, введите правильный адрес электронной почты

item.en: The verification code can't be empty
item.de: Der Bestätigungscode darf nicht leer sein
item.fr: Le code de vérification ne peut pas être vide
item.it: Il codice di verifica non può essere vuoto
item.ru: Код подтверждения не может быть пустым

item.zh: 验证码已发送请注意查收!
item.en: The verification code has been sent, please check it!
item.de: Der Bestätigungscode wurde gesendet, bitte überprüfen Sie ihn!
item.fr: Le code de vérification a été envoyé, veuillez le vérifier!
item.it: Il codice di verifica è stato inviato, per favore controlla!
item.ru: Код подтверждения отправлен, пожалуйста, проверьте его!

item.en: Congratulations, the email binding is successful!
item.de: Herzlichen Glückwunsch, die E-Mail-Bindung ist erfolgreich!
item.fr: Félicitations, la liaison par e-mail est réussie!
item.it: Congratulazioni, l'associazione e-mail ha avuto successo!
item.ru: Поздравляем, привязка электронной почты прошла успешно!

item.zh: 服务端TOKEN超出有效时间，请尝试重新打开应用
item.en: The server TOKEN exceeds the valid time, please try to reopen the app
item.de: Der Server-Token überschreitet die gültige Zeit. Bitte versuchen Sie, die App erneut zu öffnen
item.fr: Le TOKEN du serveur dépasse la durée de validité, veuillez essayer de rouvrir l'application
item.it: Il server TOKEN supera il tempo valido, prova a riaprire l'app
item.ru: Сервер TOKEN превышает допустимое время, пожалуйста, попробуйте снова открыть приложение

item.fr: Le format du compte est incorrect
item.it: Il formato dell'account non è corretto

item.fr: Le format du mot de passe est incorrect
item.it: Il formato della password non è corretto

item.zh: * 账号由6-30位英文字母，数字组成或者一个邮箱地址
item.en: * The account consists of 6-30 English letters and numbers or an email address
item.de: * Das Konto besteht aus 6-30 englischen Buchstaben und Zahlen oder einer E-Mail-Adresse
item.fr: * Le compte se compose de 6 à 30 lettres et chiffres anglais ou d'une adresse e-mail
item.it: * L'account è composto da 6-30 lettere e numeri inglesi o un indirizzo e-mail
item.ru: * Счет состоит из 6-30 английских букв и цифр или адреса электронной почты.

item.zh: * 密码由6-30位英文字母，数字组成
item.en: * The password consists of 6-30 English letters and numbers
item.de: * Das Passwort besteht aus 6-30 englischen Buchstaben und Zahlen
item.fr: * Le mot de passe se compose de 6 à 30 lettres et chiffres anglais
item.it: * La password è composta da 6-30 lettere e numeri inglesi
item.ru: * Пароль состоит из 6-30 английских букв и цифр

item.it: Congratulazioni! Registrazione del conto avvenuta con successo

item.zh: 请稍后！账号密码正在获取中
item.en: Please wait! Account password is gettingv
item.de: Bitte warten! Das Passwort für das Konto wird abgerufen
item.fr: Veuillez patienter! Le mot de passe du compte devient
item.it: Per favore aspetta! La password dell'account sta ottenendo
item.ru: Пожалуйста, подождите! Пароль учетной записи становится

item.zh: 请阅读协议并勾选同意
item.en: Please read the agreement and click to agree
item.de: Bitte lesen Sie die Vereinbarung und klicken Sie, um zuzustimmen
item.fr: Veuillez lire l'accord et cliquer pour accepter
item.it: Leggere l'accordo e fare clic per accettare
item.ru: Пожалуйста, прочитайте соглашение и нажмите, чтобы согласиться

item.it: Si prega di inserire l'account corretto

item.zh: 密码必须由英文字母，数字或特殊符号组成
item.en: Password must be composed of English letters, numbers or special symbols.
item.de: Das Passwort besteht aus Buchstaben, Zahlen und englischen Symbolen, ca. 6 bis 30 Zeichen
item.fr: Le mot de passe est composé de lettres, de chiffres et de symboles anglais d'environ 6 à 30 caractères
item.it: La password deve essere composta da lettere, numeri e simboli inglesi, tra 6 a 30 caratteri
item.ru: Пароль состоит из букв, цифр и английских символов, от 6 до 30 символов

item.zh: 两次密码不一致，请重新输入！
item.en: Passwords are inconsistent twice. Please re-enter!
item.de: Die beiden Passwörter stimmen nicht überein, bitte erneut eingeben!
item.fr: Les mots de passe ne sont pas identiques deux fois, Veuillez les saisir à nouveau!
item.it: Le password non sono coerenti. reimmetterle!
item.ru: Дважды пароль не совпадает, введите его снова!

item.fr: L'e-mail ne peut pas être nul.
item.ru: Электронная почта не может быть нулевой.

item.de: Das Mobiltelefon kann nicht null sein.
item.fr: Le numéro de téléphone portable ne peut pas être vide
item.it: Il telefono cellulare non può essere nullo.
item.ru: Мобильный телефон не может быть нулевым.

item.zh: 账号已存在。请重新输入其它账号进行注册
item.en: Account already existed. Please enter another account to Sign up
item.de: Konto existierte bereits. Bitte geben Sie ein anderes Konto ein, um sich anzumelden
item.fr: Le compte existait déjà. Veuillez entrer un autre compte pour vous inscrire
item.it: Account già esistente. Inserisci un altro account per registrarti
item.ru: Аккаунт уже существует. Пожалуйста, введите другую учетную запись, чтобы зарегистрироваться
item.ko: 계정이 이미 존재합니다. 가입하려면 다른 계정을 입력하십시오

item.zh: 请输入正确的邮箱地址
item.de: Bitte stelle sicher, dass du die richtige E-Mail-Adresse eingibst
item.it: Assicurati che l'indirizzo email sia corretto
item.ru: Убедитесь, что введенный адрес электронной почты верный

item.zh: 请阅读并同意《用户协议》及《隐私政策》
item.en: Please read and agree to the user agreement and privacy policy
item.de: Bitte lesen und akzeptieren Sie die Benutzervereinbarung und Datenschutzrichtlinie
item.fr: Veuillez lire et accepter les Conditions d’utilisation et la Politique de confidentialité
item.it: Si prega di leggere e accettare i Termini di servizio e l'Informativa sulla privacy
item.ru: Пожалуйста, прочтите и примите Условия обслуживания и Политику конфиденциальности
item.ko: 사용자 프로토콜 및 프라이버시 정책을 읽고 동의하십시오.

item.fr: Veuillez saisir le mot de passe

item.zh: 游客账号不易保管，建议您注册正式账号或及时绑定账号
item.en: A formal account or account binding is highly recommended.
item.de: Es ist nicht sicher, ein Besucherkonto aufzubewahren. Es wird empfohlen, ein offizielles Konto zu registrieren oder das Konto rechtzeitig zu verknüpfen
item.fr: Il n'est pas prudent de garder le compte visiteur. Il est recommandé de créer un compte officiel ou de le lier à temps
item.it: Gli account visitatori non sono facili da mantenere, si consiglia di registrarsi per un account ufficiale o di associarne uno
item.ru: Держать учетную запись посетителя небезопасно. Рекомендуется зарегистрировать официальную учетную запись или вовремя привязать учетную запись

item.zh: 安全提醒：您的账号目前尚未绑定邮箱，将无法找回密码
item.en: Notice: Your account haven't bound with email.
item.de: Tipps: Um die Sicherheit des Kontos zu gewährleisten.
item.fr: Rappel de sécurité: votre compte n'a pas été lié à l'email, vous ne pourrez pas récupérer votre mot de passe.
item.it: Promemoria di sicurezza: il tuo account non è associato al tuo indirizzo e-mail e non sarai in grado di recuperare la password.
item.ru: Ваша учетная запись не привязана к вашему адресу электронной почты, вы не сможете восстановить пароль.

item.zh: 注意：您的账号未绑定任何邮箱或手机号码。请
item.en: Notice: Your account has not been connected to any Email or Mobile Phone. Please
item.de: Hinweis: Ihr Konto wurde mit keiner E-Mail verbunden. Bitte
item.fr: Attention: votre compte n'a été connecté à aucun e-mail ou numéro de portable. S'il vous plaît
item.it: Avviso: il tuo account non è stato collegato a nessuna email. per favore
item.ru: Примечание: ваша учетная запись не связана ни с одним электронным письмом. Пожалуйста
item.ko: 주의:이메일이나 휴대폰에 계정이 결합되어 있지 않습니다

item.zh: 根据国家新闻出版署《关于进一步严格管理 切实防止未成年人沉迷网络游戏的通知》规定，您必须完成实名登记，才能进入游戏，未认证用户将无法进入游戏。我们不会泄露您的认证信息，或将其用于其他用途。
item.en: According to the relevant regulations of the National Press and Publication Administration to online games, you must complete real-name registration to access the game. Unverified users will not be permitted to enter the game. We assure you that your authentication information will not be disclosed or used for other purposes.
item.de: According to the relevant regulations of the National Press and Publication Administration to online games, you must complete real-name registration to access the game. Unverified users will not be permitted to enter the game. We assure you that your authentication information will not be disclosed or used for other purposes.
item.fr: According to the relevant regulations of the National Press and Publication Administration to online games, you must complete real-name registration to access the game. Unverified users will not be permitted to enter the game. We assure you that your authentication information will not be disclosed or used for other purposes.
item.it: According to the relevant regulations of the National Press and Publication Administration to online games, you must complete real-name registration to access the game. Unverified users will not be permitted to enter the game. We assure you that your authentication information will not be disclosed or used for other purposes.
item.ru: According to the relevant regulations of the National Press and Publication Administration to online games, you must complete real-name registration to access the game. Unverified users will not be permitted to enter the game. We assure you that your authentication information will not be disclosed or used for other purposes.
item.ko: According to the relevant regulations of the National Press and Publication Administration to online games, you must complete real-name registration to access the game. Unverified users will not be permitted to enter the game. We assure you that your authentication information will not be disclosed or used for other purposes.

item.zh: 您当前填写的身份信息有误，请核实身份信息后再次进行实名认证，感谢配合。
item.en: The identity information you have entered is incorrectly. Please verify your identity information and try the real-name authentication again. Thank you for your cooperation.
item.de: Das Format Ihrer aktuellen Identitätsinformationen ist falsch. Bitte überprüfen Sie Ihre Identitätsinformationen und führen Sie erneut Echtnamen-Authentifizierung durch. Vielen Dank für Ihre Mitarbeit.
item.fr: Il y a une erreur dans le format des informations d'identité que vous remplissez actuellement. Veuillez vérifier les informations d'identité et procéder à l'authentification du nom réel à nouveau. Merci pour votre coopération.
item.it: Il formato delle informazioni di identità attuali non è corretto. Si prega di verificare le informazioni di identità e di effettuare nuovamente l'autenticazione del nome reale. Grazie per la collaborazione.
item.ru: В настоящее время вы вводите неверный формат идентифицирующей информации, проверьте идентификационную информацию и проверьте подлинное имя, спасибо за сотрудничество.

item.zh: 根据国家新闻出版署《关于进一步严格管理 切实防止未成年人沉迷网络游戏的通知》规定，经过对您身份信息的验证，
item.en: According to the relevant policy regulations of the National Press and Publication Administration, after verification of your identity information
item.de: According to the relevant policy regulations of the National Press and Publication Administration, after verification of your identity information
item.fr: According to the relevant policy regulations of the National Press and Publication Administration, after verification of your identity information
item.it: According to the relevant policy regulations of the National Press and Publication Administration, after verification of your identity information
item.ru: According to the relevant policy regulations of the National Press and Publication Administration, after verification of your identity information
item.ko: According to the relevant policy regulations of the National Press and Publication Administration, after verification of your identity information

item.zh: 您提交的实名信息属于未成年人
item.en: Your submitted info indicates a minor
item.de: Your submitted info indicates a minor
item.fr: Your submitted info indicates a minor
item.it: Your submitted info indicates a minor
item.ru: Your submitted info indicates a minor
item.ko: Your submitted info indicates a minor

item.zh: 您将无法进行游戏，点击确定后将关闭游戏。
item.en: You can't play. Clicking OK will close the game.
item.de: You can't play. Clicking OK will close the game.
item.fr: You can't play. Clicking OK will close the game.
item.it: You can't play. Clicking OK will close the game.
item.ru: You can't play. Clicking OK will close the game.
item.ko: You can't play. Clicking OK will close the game.

item.de: Bitte geben Sie das Handy ein
item.it: Si prega di inserire il cellulare

item.fr: Veuillez saisir le mot de passe

item.de: Geben Sie das Passwort erneut ein.
item.fr: Veuillez saisir à nouveau votre mot de passe

item.en: I have read and agree to
item.de: Ich habe gelesen und bin damit einverstanden

item.zh: 请输入需绑定的邮箱地址
请输入需绑定的手机号码
如果您已发送验证码后，长时间仍未收到邮件，请检查您的垃圾邮箱。
item.en: If you have sent a verification code and have not received an email for a long time, please check your junk mail.
item.de: Wenn du die E-Mail längere Zeit nach dem Senden des Verifizierungscodes nicht erhalten hast, überprüfe bitte deine Spam.
item.fr: Si vous n'avez pas reçu l'e-mail après une longue durée après avoir envoyé le code de vérification, veuillez vérifier votre messagerie de spam.
item.it: Se non ricevi l'email da molto tempo dopo la richiesta, controlla la cartella spam.
item.ru: Если вы не получили письмо в течение длительного времени после отправки проверочного кода, проверьте спам.

item.fr: Veuillez choisir un mode de paiement

item.zh: 您当前选择的国家或地区的货币存在较大的汇率问题，请先前往Windows设置中更改您的国家或地区设置，然后选用其他货币重新进行商品购买操作。
item.en: There is a significant currency exchange rate issue with the country or region you currently have selected. Please first navigate to Windows Settings to change your country or region settings, and then proceed with purchasing items again using a different currency.
item.de: There is a significant currency exchange rate issue with the country or region you currently have selected. Please first navigate to Windows Settings to change your country or region settings, and then proceed with purchasing items again using a different currency.
item.fr: There is a significant currency exchange rate issue with the country or region you currently have selected. Please first navigate to Windows Settings to change your country or region settings, and then proceed with purchasing items again using a different currency.
item.it: There is a significant currency exchange rate issue with the country or region you currently have selected. Please first navigate to Windows Settings to change your country or region settings, and then proceed with purchasing items again using a different currency.
item.ru: There is a significant currency exchange rate issue with the country or region you currently have selected. Please first navigate to Windows Settings to change your country or region settings, and then proceed with purchasing items again using a different currency.

item.zh: 您当前支付所使用的货币存在严重汇率误差，建议您通过微软官方网站对本笔订单申请退款。这样一来，您将不会收到该订单内的所有商品。如果您仍然希望购买这些商品，请更换其他货币重新下单购买。
item.en: There is a substantial currency exchange rate error with the currency currently being used for your payment. We recommend that you apply for a refund through Microsoft's official website for this order. As a result, you will not receive all the items within this order. If you still wish to purchase these goods, please place a new order using a different currency.
item.de: There is a substantial currency exchange rate error with the currency currently being used for your payment. We recommend that you apply for a refund through Microsoft's official website for this order. As a result, you will not receive all the items within this order. If you still wish to purchase these goods, please place a new order using a different currency.
item.fr: There is a substantial currency exchange rate error with the currency currently being used for your payment. We recommend that you apply for a refund through Microsoft's official website for this order. As a result, you will not receive all the items within this order. If you still wish to purchase these goods, please place a new order using a different currency.
item.it: There is a substantial currency exchange rate error with the currency currently being used for your payment. We recommend that you apply for a refund through Microsoft's official website for this order. As a result, you will not receive all the items within this order. If you still wish to purchase these goods, please place a new order using a different currency.
item.ru: There is a substantial currency exchange rate error with the currency currently being used for your payment. We recommend that you apply for a refund through Microsoft's official website for this order. As a result, you will not receive all the items within this order. If you still wish to purchase these goods, please place a new order using a different currency.
